title: Add Company Match Verification
description:
Implement company matching logic to prevent wrong-company results.
        
Current Problem:
- Finding right person at wrong company
- Example: "Pascual Estrada at Mount Sinai" returns "Pascual Estrada at Tufts"
- Weak company validation (50% word match)

Solution:
1. Implement company scoring algorithm:
   - Exact match: 100 points
   - All key words present: 80 points
   - Industry + partial match: 60 points
   - No match: 0 points (reject)
2. Create company alias database:
   - "Mount Sinai" = ["Mount Sinai Health", "MSH", "Mount Sinai Hospital"]
3. Require minimum company score threshold
4. Log company match reasoning
acceptance_criteria: Clear logging of company match scores
